Title: J.D. Martinez, Boston Red Sox DH: ‘Chip on my shoulder’ is back entering 2021; ‘I wasn’t really prepared for last year’
Description: Red Sox DH J.D. Martinez finished the shortened 2020 season with the 12th worst on-base percentage (.291), 17th worst batting average (.213), 21st worst OPS (.680) and 28th worst slugging percentage (.
Author: MassLive on MSN.com
